channel.title: RMarkdown on Website of Hoas.
channel.description: Recent content in RMarkdown on Website of Hoas.

item.title: The Difference Method(.Rmarkdown)
item.description: The question is solved with R and this report is made by R Markdown. One of the reasons is that they are both in RStudio, which is new to me and I want to try. In R Markdown, the Chinese characters are so ugly and glare so I decided to use English to convey what I want to express. This is my first report written in English and shaped by R with R Markdown!
